data.title: Euronext on LinkedIn: Congratulations to Mota
data.meta_description:
Congratulations to Mota-Engil on their successful Sustainability-Linked bond issue on Euronext Lisbon!
With this transaction, the construction company commits…
data.text:
🌍 Mark your calendars for #EuronextSustainabilityWeek2024, taking place from 9 to 13 September 2024! This week-long event is dedicated to #SustainableFinance, offering a fantastic opportunity for public debate and direct dialogue between companies and investors. Euronext will be diving deep crucial topics like sustainable investing, ESG reporting, and #greenfinance. Join #ESG experts, issuers, investors, governmental delegates, and financial institution representatives for a series of local sessions, workshops, and webinars—both online and in person. This is your chance to gain valuable insights and contribute to meaningful discussions shaping the future of sustainable finance. Don't miss out! Check out the complete list of #Euronext activities and make sure to reserve time in your agenda for the events and webinars that interest you. 👉 https://lnkd.in/dq45cCMN

On 20th June 2024, we celebrated a remarkable milestone – #ThePowerOf10 years since Euronext's IPO. 👏 By ringing the bell across all our locations, we commemorated a decade of fulfilling our European dream and transforming the continental landscape of capital markets. 🔔 As we embark on a new and ambitious journey, the #Euronext mission remains powerful and clear: to reinforce agility and continue shaping the future of #capitalmarkets for generations to come. A heartfelt thank you to everyone who has been part of this incredible adventure. More about our journey: https://lnkd.in/eX7WQqRU

Ever wondered about the origins of the 🐂 bull and 🐻 bear symbolism in the stock market? In this episode of #BTS we explore the fascinating history and meaning behind these iconic figures. As the leading pan-European market infrastructure, #Euronext is well-positioned to understand the significance of these symbols and their impact on global markets. Join us as we take a closer look at the iconic bull statue at Euronext Amsterdam and reflect on the message it sends to the financial world. 🎬 #BTS at Euronext is a behind-the-scenes series where we delve into our inner workings, offer educational insights, and share invaluable information!

🔔 Today, we welcome IMEON ENERGY on Euronext Access + Paris! ☀️ ⚡ IMEON ENERGY provides smart solutions for the optimised use of solar energy to individuals and industry in more than 70 countries. Thanks to its range of intelligent hybrid inverters, the company contributes to the energy transition by increasing the yield of photovoltaic installations and offering the most competitive price per kWh on the market. 🎓 IMEON ENERGY is an alumni of #IPOready, our training programme that provide executives with the tools and insights they need to achieve their IPO successfully. With Christophe GOASGUEN, and the advisors: Bretlim Fortuny, Evolucie, Fieldfisher, NewCap and TP ICAP Midcap. Link to the Press Release: https://lnkd.in/dZRTSn7P

Today, we congratulate Adventure S.p.A. on their #EuronextGrowthMilan listing! 🔔 Adventure is a digital communications company and a leader in digital technologies and solutions. Adventure’s listing represents the 15th listing this year on Euronext Growth Milan, Borsa Italiana’s market for small and medium-sized companies, and it is Euronext’s 33rd listing of this year. 👏

Welcome to #EuronextGrowthMilan, FinanceForFood 🔔 Finance For Food is an industrial and strategic consulting firm that specialises in the entire agri-food supply chain, other sectors of the agro-industry, renewable energy and related economic services and activities. Finance For Food’s listing represents the 14th listing this year on Euronext Growth Milan, Borsa Italiana’s market for small and medium-sized companies, and it is Euronext’s 32nd listing of this year.

🚀 Euronext Tech Leaders is dedicated to empowering tech companies by building on Euronext’s thriving tech ecosystem, which is already home to over 700 tech companies listed on Euronext markets. It not only enhances the visibility of high-growth and leading tech companies to international investors but also offers a comprehensive suite of services to support them on their listing journey. A key component of this initiative is the Euronext Tech Leaders Index, featuring 110+ high-growth companies that meet specific criteria for inclusion. Discover how #Euronext is driving innovation and growth in the tech sector. 🔗 Learn more: https://lnkd.in/dajrKgpW #EuronextIndices #Tech #Innovation #EuronextTechLeaders

🌟 The #IPOready 2024 participants recommend Euronext’s programme to their peers! 📈 This unanimous result comes from our programme survey and reflects the value and impact of #IPOready in preparing companies for capital markets and their IPO journey. 🌍 Are you ready to elevate your company to the next level? Join the new edition of #Euronext's #IPOready programme and be part of this incredible journey. 📢 Discover more and apply today: https://lnkd.in/dajrKgpW

Welcome to Euronext Growth Milan, NOVAMARINE! 🔔 Founded in 2008 and headquartered in the nautical hub of Olbia, Sardinia, Novamarine has become a leader in the production of recreational boats up to 30 meters. Today, we are thrilled to celebrate Novamarine’s listing on Borsa Italiana’s market for small and medium-sized companies. This marks the 13th listing of the year on this market and the 31st listing of the year across #Euronext.👏

Welcome to Euronext Growth Milan, Misitano & Stracuzzi! 🔔 Misitano & Stracuzzi is a leading Italian B2B player internationally active in the creation, production and marketing of citrus essences and aromatic solutions, mainly of natural origin. To a lesser extent, the company is also active in the production and marketing of citrus juices. Misitano & Stracuzzi listing represents the 12th listing this year on Borsa Italiana’s market for small and medium-sized companies, and it is #Euronext’s 30th listing of the year.👏
